visual.name: Drill_Down_Pie_PIN_by_ZoomCharts
visual.displayName: Drill Down Pie PRO (PIN) by ZoomCharts

dataRoles.description: The field for slice images. Only base64 encoded image content is displayed (URI that starts with data:image/<format>;base64).
dataRoles.name: sliceImage

trialLicense.description: Currently, this block is meant to be hidden.

info.description: Turn off to hide the info button. The info button can only be removed if a paid license is detected.

preview.description: Hidden field, only enabling it from a theme to allow some functionallity.

hideProperties.description: Hidden field, provide values delimited with ',' from a theme to hide properties.

radius.description: The outer size of the pie.

gauge.description: Display half of the chart as a gauge

theme3d.description: Apply a 3D effect on the chart

maxSlicesVisible.description: Number of visible slices before `Others` and `Previous` slices appear

othersLabel.description: This setting allows to change the name of `Others` slice.

previousLabel.description: This setting allows to change the name of `Previous` slice.

othersSizing.description: This setting allows to switch between actual and default sizing mode for the `Others` and `Previous` slices.

hideEmptyValues.description: Exclude categories that have blank names.

width.description: Control the desired width of the legend. 0 means auto. Legend width cannot be smaller than the space that it needs to render one item.

height.description: Control the desired height of the legend. 0 means auto. Legend height cannot be smaller than the space that it needs to render one item.

floating.description: This setting lets you float the legend panel on top of the chart. This might be useful in cases where you have little space available. Note, that if enabled, chart may overlap with the legend entries.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

placementMode.description: Select the preferred label placement mode. 'Align' aligns labels in columns, 'Wrap' places them tightly around the chart.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

decimals.description: Set number of decimals for values

decimalsPercentage.description: Set number of decimals for percents
Set number of decimals for percents

zoomOutBtn.description: Whether to show the `Zoom Out` button in the toolbar

backBtn.description: Whether to show the `Back` button in the toolbar

location.description: Toolbar can be shown on the chart area our outside it

opacity.description: Opacity of the gradient color, 0 - transparent, 100 - opaque. This setting controls the outermost opacity level of the slice, if gradient mode is enabled. Opacity starts from 100 at the Gradient start location and decreases towards the set value in a linear way.

gradientStep.description: 0 - inside, 100 - outside. If the outer opacity of the slice is provided, opacity calculation starts at this point from 100 to the specified opacity value.

baseColorSaturationAdjustment.description: 0 means 0% saturation, 100 means 100% saturation;  50 means saturation is unaffected. E.g. 51 means that additional 1% is added to the color's saturation.

baseColorLightnessAdjustment.description: 0 means 0% lightness, 100 means 100% lightness;  50 means lightness is unaffected. E.g. 51 means that additional 1% is added to the color's lightness.
